string.text: Attention! An emission is imminent! Get out of the open! Find cover!
Attention! An emission is imminent! Find shelter quickly...
Attention! Attention! An emission is expected very soon!
Based on meteorological and seismological data, an emission is fast-approaching! Get under cover!
Important Message

Bullseye: private channel
Shadows: private channel
I know where is the entrance to the laboratory X-8. Send in.
All right. I hope Pavel is alive... He knows what we want.
Unknown: private channel
Bullseye, circumstances have changed! One of the soldiers that was with Colonel survived! Just saw him on the way to the checkpoint. Faster race there, until he was told about the incident.
Article in journal:
Intel about mutant:
Intel about grouping:
Intel about artefact:
Intel about Anomalie:
Intel about location:
Zone History:
Local folklore:
Personal note:
Intel about transport:
Downloaded PDA data:
Military Secret:
Danger! Critical pressure!
Unable to generate flames without colloidal gas or gasoline.
No flamethrower to refill!
STALKER!! Stop!!!
New Artefact Modification downloaded to PDA...
The Doctor is alive!!!\nHurry! Follow him through the teleport to a safe place.
The Teleport is ready...
Enemies are too nearby to use the Repair-Kit!!!
The weapon in the first slot has been repaired...
The weapon in the second slot has been repaired...
Weapon too severely damaged!!!
The weapon does not require repairs...
Armor successfully repaired
the armor is too severely damaged!!!
the armor does not require repair
What armor? Moron!
Received: three RIA-10 Repair-Kits
Received: three RIW-10 Repair-Kits
Received: RIA-10 Repair-Kit
Received: RIW-10 Repair-Kit

Yes, in the zone is nothing just do not ... That's an example - to find the minigun for Adrenalin ... It should be found in Yantar, where the helicopter went down... And where is this Yantar? Customer hinted that he needed to talk with a professor by the name of Sakharov ...

It was not so simple. We must take Sakharov's special detector, then go to the Wild Territory and seek with this detector for the military thing. What is that thing, I do not know. However, the detector will signal if I'm at a distance of ten meters away from it. After finding it, I should bring it to Sakharov and pick up a minigun for adrenaline.

Waugh, got involved ... Find in the ATP-infested enemies and mutants, the exoskeleton ... This case is highly unlikely. Well, that Voronin told the approximate location of it. They will not immediately give up this armor. Voronin can wait, and I may find the 'cloak of invisibility' to be very useful.

Screw this, so droll! Bring him the usual vices through the floor of the Zone ... Quite to the head does not make friends. Although ... All geniuses are a little weird, but this does not look like a genius. And, then, just disabled by brain from childhood ... It's good that there is an approximate figure, where these vices can be. Fitter-taught, mmat it.

We must get antizombin to watch 'Freedom'. Have to be dragged behind it for new traders. Here I am stump, it was necessary to immediately buy ... And not one, but a couple ... And suddenly, the hog more of them will not sell? Go north in Chernobyl NPP, for sure, then very useful ...

It is necessary to extract and bring Lukash brain Controller of at least two pieces. You can search for it in the ATP or trudge to the north of Chernobyl ... In addition, find the anarchist and talk to my will, as long as my pocket will not be three hundred thousand scars.

Adrenalin gave me information about one of the exits from the ATP and asks you to bring him to drive for the company, which carried him to one of the stalkers. You can, of course, drive, and do not look for it. I did, after all, and so knew where the exit from the territory ... Adrenalin had no choice as to tell me about it before setting. Otherwise, as I got out? But the conscience I still have. So I'll try to do the job.
Adrenalin gave me information about one of the exits from the ATP. Go to the Cordon, presumably, is on these stones.

I got information about another outlet with the ATP, the army warehouses. It is somewhere in this corner of the roof. On the third passage knows Sakharov. We must see him, until the bullet is not words ...

Yes, but the professor is not very much appreciative of other people's lives ... Because of the bags in this ass posted ... Well, that at least a rough determination of a mobile observation point gave the military. It's somewhere in the Chernobyl-NPP1, near the entrance to the sarcophagus ...
I have information on the last, and it seems very proper transition from the ATP - in Pripyat. Judging by this picture, it is necessary to explore this part of the destroyed roof.

I need to find the lost locket for the Marsh Doctor. It is located in a backpack on the roof of one of the skyscrapers of Pripyat. I can not imagine how I will climbe on the roofs of these ... But the Doc hinted about the possibility of passage for high-rise with the ATP.

Sakharov sold recipe Artefact Modification: From a Controller's bezoar in a Burner anomaly can come a Plasma Caterpillar artefact. Transform time of five minutes, the probability of a successful outcome of the transformation 75%

I have information on the transition from the north at Chernobyl NPP. All Svoboda said that the label from the card could disappear due to abnormal activity at the station. Well, that though the picture is ...

We must find in the minefield, which left the road at the checkpoint at the cordon, three of the bubble with the medicine and bring them to Akim ... 'In the garden there, in the city, was running a dog' ... Here's your medicine.
What have I got? ... Steep stalker went to look for Crows Eggs for drunken chef ... We have to go to Akim and find out where these Crows sweep and collect ten eggs.

Shakhtar recovery day view needs two flashlights. Do nothing, will have to find them. And the old man helped himself, and use ... Who we've got trades on the border? Sidorovich, Akim and Kuznetsov ... Take an interest.

Akim hit in childhood, a former army blew the roof ... He needs a Rubik's Cube, who threw one of the bandits on some of the roof of an unfinished building on the base of bandits in Dark Valley. Okay, I'll stay in the role of Batman a bit ...

I'll Have to find somewhere on the outskirts of the Forgotten Forest remains Rasstrel's people. Who, when and why did it, I do not know .. I only know that one of these accidents was the book. Minor needs this book desperately. I know also that this place is located next to two or three large stones. And collapsed helicopter there still should be ...

Baldy decided to share his lost treasure and asked me to bring him the contents, which is in some Cave. Good luck! I have no superfluous gestures learned where to locate the entrance to the cave! That is, only ... Is there this Shakhtar? Or was the cave... a dream? Need to know. Or maybe a treasure I will find.. coins of gold ...\nI should see if the Miner knows anything about it.
Miner needs a 'Controller Scalp' artefact. Otherwise, he will not give me the PDA...

In ... Has not yet managed to escape from the cordon, and have already found ten hands of zombies ... I do not even know where they are found, look like ... Here is the news ... In the Zone is a zombie?
Akim needs some old document. 'In the Dump, on top of something...' he said. A building? A bus? A container? Where the hell do I start?
Well .. I knew it ... Now we must bring more to Akim and the second part of documents that are somewhere in the subway Institute ... It is easier for a needle in a haystack to find.

Akim needs a third document from X-18. However, this one has been separated into four sections! He says that three should be inside the lab, and the fourth somewhere outside near the lab's entrance...

Hired a courier's delivery ... I need to get: SCAT-10, the Exoskeleton of stalkers, bandits Exoskeleton, Academic Duty PSZ-9MD. And it's - there's more! We still have to find the PDA and document. The document is located somewhere in the X-16 and the PDA in the area of the crane, which stands at the base of an unfinished building of the bandit's base in Dark Valley. 'Short and sweet' ... Easier to get to Monolith, what does all this get.
To do this, my 'geeky-biologist' friend needs one of each mutant part... What the hell is he is going to do with them?

Crest took fifteen arts. Five pieces of each kind: 'Medusa', 'Stone Flower', 'Fireball'. Better just to find the balls, and then the 'Medusa' and 'Flower' to keep radiation down. Well, that Crest did not take as many 'Controller Scalps' ...
Must locate six anomalous 'Bison' for Crest. They have not only military. Caught and Bandos, Vigilante, and Monolith. We'll have to hunt ...

The job is not easy, though nearby, in the forest ... Focusing is extremely insufficient. We need to find a downed chopper, and next to it, a bunch of stones in which the military could stay the night with teleporters in your pocket.
We must ask lanky in Bar, where flasks for Petrenko are. I hope that this gold-plated bottle - the only such expensive for Petrenko, that he has lost in this life.

In wrong price, intellectual ... Ten chips have warriors in the cordon to find five 'quirks' to bring, and yes even fifty thousand scars riprap ... Send to himself in the night travel on the Zone, arrange on a regular basis, every five minutes ...

For people who want Voronin thermoses. And different, big and small. Five pieces of each volume. I roughly know where there are large, since there is a picture of their location. They are somewhere near a tree, outside the base of Freedom. To get there, we should go along the power transmission lines. But, the little flasks should learn from Garik, a security guard for bartender.

For information about small thermos Garik requires ten packs of cigarettes and twenty thousand roubles ... Robust design for a redneck who I'd just stupidly present in the bar. The same to me, the bodyguard ...

Sidorovich offended, and now a present from Petrenko he just did not beg. And sorry to kill him, he suddenly has come in handy? Therefore, I need to bring the two repair kits, each of which includes a hammer, screwdriver and wrench. Hammers and screwdrivers you can get in the ATP, but the keys have to whistle for Screw in his studio.
We need to find based on the Hog secret room and pick up from her computer with an antenna and videorecorder. All this equipment must be delivered to Voronin.

Well, my e ... Just dragged ... and here ... One environmentalist pulled, will now have two to carry. Hopefully, they will cooperate ... We have to go to move to Rostok and meet these two nerds. Then hold them in a bunker Sakharov. The handles and news? Or a white stick? Well, at least if they die, pick up one phone and bring to Sakharov. Yes, we must not forget. Themselves environmentalists silo door will not open - their hands were busy. We must open the door and wait until they come.
We must get 'OTS-14 Groza for defense outpost 'debt'. After the report from Voronin. Basically, he's right. Good gun in the upcoming dust-did not interfere.

Vigorous loaf ... Come on business and got involved ... It is necessary to help repel the attack of mercenaries on a checkpoint of Duty, that on the border with Wilderness territory and destroy their leader, nicknamed Hump. This must be done for me personally, not someone from the Dolg... otherwise Voronin will not communicate with me ... I wonder how he knows about it?

Well, things ... Not only to me their concerns, so more were added. It is necessary to repel the bandits, and then find and neutralize their leader, nicknamed Shnyrov. He should be in the ATP. Yes, still have to look after Kalinin - in short a stray bullet, and all my efforts were in vain. In addition to awards for the job, I feel the spinal cord, Kalinin, I still need it.

Must meet the messenger who carries Kalinin information. He goes straight from the end of the road leading from ATP (the road the other side of ATP, if you look out from where I went to the ATP) and may die. Then the info and awards I have not seen ... Kalinin advises to use for speed a UAZ.
Kalinin is preparing for an attack on his camp from a group of special forces and two armored vehicles. He's asked me to bring him an Iglomet sniper rifle, his weapon of choice for this scenario...
My goal, personally destroy two APC and commander of the military ... Well, screw yourself! Found the destroyer of technology ...
Miner gave information about where the transition to a landfill. It is located on the lower level of the caves. There is a mark on my PDA.
Shakhtar uploaded information on the transition from a cave to Agroprom. It is located next to the anomalies at the entrance to the Miner camp.
Baldy at the bar said the transition from the dump to the cave, which is located in an abandoned railway tunnel.
Baldy in the bar gave a tip about the transition from the Agricultural industry to the cave, which is literally in a railway tunnel
Kalinin gave a tip to the transition from the Dark Valley to the Forgotten Forest. Come in handy in any ...

Miner gave information about the transition from a cave to the Labyrinth. He is in a place crash in the cave. It's in the hall, which can be accessed through a narrow shaft, rising on a steep wall on the lower level caves.

It's good that the prisoner survived. He gave a tip to the transition of the Labyrinth of the cave. The transition is located on the lower level, in one of the caves near the entrance to the second cave of the Labyrinth.
Fima Coal, a former prisoner Monolith, gave a tip to the transition of the Labyrinth at Yantar. The transition is at the top of the Labyrinth.
Miner told to move out of the maze on Reconoitered Earth, which said Fima Coal. The transition is at the top of the Labyrinth.
Adrenalin suggested that there is a transition to Yantar in the Labyrinth, and noted it on the map in my PDA.
Sakharov as a reward for the bag said the transition from ATP to Pripyat. With a broken roof ridge on the ATP - the roof of Skyscraper on the Pripyat River.
Adrenalin gave me information on the transition from ATP to Army Warehouses.
Adrenalin gave me information about the transition from ATP to the Cordon.
Kalinin gave me a tip on the trail from the ATP landfill, said it started in my PDA.
The old man shared the trail from the Army Warehouses to the RECON.
The old man spoke about the transition from the Dark Valley to the RECON. Find it on the PDA map is not difficult.
Cyclops gave a tip to the transition from the Garbage to the RECON. Useful trail!
Cyclops said about the transition from the RECON to the Labyrinth. The transition is located right in the cave of the Infirmary.
Fang gave information about the transition from the radar to a military lab. It is located in one of the doors on the second floor of a small tank that is located near the crossroads at Pripyat.

Here's more information on the Fang. On the transition from a military lab to the Laboratory X-16. Apparently, all underground utilities are connected by tunnels that allows you to move quickly underground.
Bodyguard Panthers announced the transition from a military lab in Army Warehouses, right on the base of Freedom. The transition mentioned in my PDA. Very useful information, by the way ...
Maples said that all the underground laboratories of the Zone were connected. One of them he knows that leads from the ground-floor of X-18 to a military lab. In my PDA is a marker.
Fanatic threw coordinates of a transition to the Swamps. The transition is located somewhere near the fence-nets for camping novices not far from Sidorovich's bunker.

Fang told me at the Bar that he had another scout, Pilgrim, who found a trail to the Red Forest. The transition is marked on the Radar and in my PDA. Just became known passage from Army Warehouses to Limansk.
Senior at the roadblock on the base of 'Freedom' gave a tip to the transition from the North of Chernobyl NPP to the ATP.
Fang uploaded coordinates for the transition from the Pripyat River to the old village. Mark appears on the PDA.
Kolmogor spoke about the transition from the Old Village in Limansk. There is a marker on the PDA.
Kolmogor told about yet another transition. From the Old Village to the Hospital.
Ghost knows where the transition from the South of Chernobyl NPP to the Generators. It starts at the gate, next to the mobile military communications post at the station.
Black Doctor opened a short trail from the Hospital to the Agroprom. It begins near the stairs in the far tail of the third Hospital section and is marked on my PDA.

The cache contained part of a card with a picture and the coordinates of the transition from the Agricultural Industry in the swamp. Just pointed out that the passage opens in the radioactive zone. Better bring a couple of Antirads or Vodka.
Adrenalin spoke about the transition from the Bar to the ATP. There is also a mark on my PDA. Finding it may not be easy.
Ghost has discovered a trail to the Generators from Pripyat. It begins near the village of stalkers.
The note from Strelok has information about extra transition from North to South Chernobyl. I copied the coordinates into your PDA
Countryman suggested the trail to the Generators in the Hospital. It is located near the barrier on the old Betonka.
In his notebook, is the code for the door, were the coordinates of the transition from the military laboratories to Generators.
Semetsky suggested the trail from Limansk to Generators. It begins near the construction site and leads through a door in a barn in an underground tunnel.

The note by the representative of a dead clan 'Last Day' were the coordinates of the transition from Red Forest in the military laboratories. The trail begins in the cave on a hillside near an abandoned tank.
With the activation of unknown device found in the cache to unlock trail from the Dead Cities to Limansk.
With the activation of unknown device found in the cache to unlock trail of the Dead City to the ATP. There is a marker on the PDA.
With the activation of unknown device found in the cache to unlock trail of the Dead City to the Wild Territory. There is a marker on the PDA about this transition.
With the activation of unknown device found in the cache to unlock trail with the ATP to the Dead City. There is a marker on the PDA about this transition.
The coordinates of the note Sparks managed to find one unlocked entrance to Backwater. There is a secret passage from the Dead city's Creek ...
To activate the portal in Limansk ... It turned out that he is not in the third dimension, as in Dead City ...
With the way cleared to the Wild territory I can now travel to X-16, a lab somewhere near the Yantar Scientific Outpost ...

My task is to release a prisoner from a Monolith jail. The code to the door is in a notebook at the clock, it is necessary to bring along this notebook. Hopefully, the immortal leader of the fanatics out there at this time will not be about ... The main thing is that the prisoner survives. Only he knows the way back from the Labyrinth.
Miner gave a recipe for artefact modification: From the artefact 'Simbion' in the Anomaly 'Jelly' for ten minutes with a probability of 75% can be obtained with the absolute name of 'Rattle'.
We must bring Fima Coal ten scientific kits, ten bandages, two pieces of soap and artefact 'Soul'. Soap is in the basement of a house in the village of newcomers to the Cordon.

Have to go again in a maze and try to find the box and safe. Box, if found, must bring to Adrenalin. It is located on the second level of the Labyrinth, and you can get there via the teleporter, which is located somewhere on the lower level ... I know where the entrance to the lower cave is, close to the transition to the Miner. Now I can go to the Labyrinth and Yantar ...

That is, bad luck ... First you need to prepare. Get two artefacts - 'rattle' and 'Plasma Caterpillars'. And then go to Sidorovich and, if lucky, join the group of fanatics. If I have vis armor - well. And if not, you will have to 'walk the gardens.' All around are enemies ... In the Labyrinth we must try to find Shadows of Monolith' missing code from the door, find a safe, again to take to Sidorovich, change the group and then bring safe to Miner. For memory, the first two codes are - 434018 and 206018.
We need to find a maze, and bring Sidorovich for the use of the Monolith Amulet: two repair boxes, which are at Monolith, as well as to return the Amulet. Where are these boxes, do not know ...
We must ask one of the pilots on from the collision, where they dropped from the helicopter the box with the weapon. Then find the box and bring it to Hermit. It's simple.

We must learn from the Cyclops, where to get medical supplies and medications to find this place. Total and business somehow, but there is one thing. You can not kill or hurt anyone ... In short, Stealth ...
We must learn from the old man, where you can get a couple of batteries to open the second door safe. Find them and bring to Jora-Anomaly

Have to go to the Hermit for information, then find the Fiery cave and try to take out the batteries for Jora. Find watches for elders. We need to find both the entrance to the cave and try to get inside.

Hence, so ... We need to find a cache for Pilgrim. It is located somewhere behind the old cabins near the right of the trail leading to the caves. Bring him all that is in the backpack. However, there is a problem. The trail has been made base for snipers, and Pilgrim asked not to make noise and get the job done without unnecessary killings. He does not want punitive responses from the snipers. If you detected... then to the order will have to make more, and seventy thousand. Otherwise, the conversation with the Pilgrim will not happen.

Victor-hologram is terminal but can be treated by special medical device, the Ultra-detector. Get one, and preferably two... and bring to Adrenalin. In addition, Adrenalin will give me the information.
Like, an honest deal. I need to get the two elite detectors and artefact 'Plasma Caterpillar'. A Victor-hologram gives a tip on location of the Ultra-detector and other useful swag.
We must learn from the Cyclops, where now there is a floppy disk with the drawings. Find it and bring to the Gynecologist. In short, again, something like, Go, fetch ...

Well, that one should not be dragged anywhere. Everything here is close. We must find the key to eliminating one of the teleports. Penetrate into the Fiery cavern and see what was on the base. We need to find two power supplies for Svoboda Exoskeleton and chip control (or something like that). And bring it all to the Gynecologist ... So much time here to drag ... Why, one wonders? Got another strange SMS from some colliding, which in the course of an old map ... Wonderful ...
That is, how I lived ... To kill Sidorovich, but still bring his head to Chimera as proof. Otherwise, I do not get reagents for Perfuzor. Go to the Gynecologist, something must come up with ...

We must go to the Rusty Timber, there is one of the rocks that are located around the perimeter of the forest to find the corpse of the Controller and drag it Filin. On payment by the Hunters while no mention was. But, obviously, for nothing they do will not be stuffed.

Need to talk to a hunter named Owl. It should help make a Scarecrow Head of Sidorovich. Then give the head to Chimera, find the bulb with solutions for Perfuzor and bring the full flask to Gynecologist.

For information on the transition from ATP Kalinin asks you to bring him three of the artefact. 'Glassbeads', 'Moonlight' and 'Flash'. All this can be gathered up in the ATP. Damn, I wonder.. rushed here without talking with stalkers of withdrawal ...

We must explore new territory and find out who lives there and is doing what. The main goal - to find out whether there is the kidnapped daughter of one of the leaders of the 'O-consciousness' there. Then it is necessary to share information with Fang and Pilgrim.

We must stomp on the Radar, to locate there a Monolith called Spider and take the Signet Ring from him. According to Lucas, Spider is at the old bunker beyond the first corner from the main road, before the turn to Pripyat. Once you have it then the Mercenaries will think your one of them and let you enter. Of course we need to return the Signet to Lukash to get the reward... but not before visiting Fang in the Bar.

It's not urgent, but the person will pay for his kindness should be, although it is a Mercenary. Job is - to whistle from the headquarters base Lukash Svoboda at Army Warehouses a stuffed Pseudodog and bring it to Panthers. It is better to kill two birds with one stone: to wait for the next job on the Panthers Army Warehouses, and when performing it, take to Scarecrow.

I have less than fifteen minutes to find the premises of a military lab station for the Mercenary Panthers. It is known that the portable radio is in a backpack, a backpack found in the laboratory. But not on its lower levels. We must remember that backpacks may be several. We'll have to hurry. Now the reputation among the Mercenaries to me is very important.

Arrive at a fixed point on the bridge and wait in the direction of the checkpoint pops a messenger. You must pick up the disc, but you can not kill the messenger himself. We have to act in another way ...

I feel one place that I still need this mercenary. And she herself - nothing simple... The main thing is not screw around at this time. It is necessary to steal from Oruzheyka Lukash's backpack, well, or its contents. Yes, we must not forget about Scarecrow's Pseudodog for the bodyguard. Task is simplified by the fact that the Panthers gave me map.
Must accompany the hologram on the Reconoitered Earth before entering the Army Warehouses. Further, he knows the way and gets himself.
Have to go to the Hologram, to try to persuade him to return to Maples. In case of success, obviously, and to accompany ... However ...
There is a chance to get an artificial artefact of 'Heart of Poltergeist.' You must bring to Maples: 'Heart Poltergeist' and ten 'Cobblestones'.

To get a present from Lucas and the key to a teleport in a military lab, I have to help the group to commit mop-up march on the Radar to the entrance to the military laboratory. Or rather, to show them an open road. With a group I meet on the Radar at the entrance to the Army Warehouses.

Sidorovich sent text messages and requests to pay with a Stalker, that in a small house near the ruins opposite the farm. That is, give him 70,000! However, the merchant promises to give a percentage for the service.
It is done. We have to go to Sidoravich and get back the money and interest.
Kolmogor's looking for his brother. There is evidence that punishers took him along with a group of prisoner Stalkers toward an abandoned store. Need help Kolmogor.

We need to find her sister Kolmogor. Incredible, but it seems that this Panther. We must find her and find out everything. However, I have long been of it has not received news. Generally not known whether she is alive. There is only one way to learn to send text messages and wait for a response. If the Panthers and sister Kolmogor, anyway, it should lead to the village.

We must help the group to capture the headquarters of the Kolmogor punishers in the Village. All the military is to clean up, and there should be only not numerous guards. The headquarters is situated on a hill in the central house. If the capture succeeds, after talks with Kolmogor.
Kolmogor asked to bring Pilgrim and explore the village. It is necessary to determine whether remains there punishers. After the reconnaissance, I need to talk to Kolmogor.
Need help stalkers to repel the attack squad, returning with a stripper on helicopters. After the successful outcome of the bout to talk to Kolmogor.

Maples can not complete the experiment in a new generator for the artefacts. He needs a Psychiatric Mobile Antenna, the signal which comes from the Cordon. Who set it there? For what purpose? I am a complete layman in physics, higher mathematics and other tricks, so it is unclear how this Hallucinogenic Antenna can help him. However, the label on the PDA, and we should go. Something he mentioned about the mutants? Hmm ...

Connoisseur Bolot requests that I reconnoiter the situation on the old farm. He needs to bring the two Zombie Embryos, who hid in one of three caches on this farm. This is his first condition for a tip on the transition from the Swamp to the old village via the Wasted Woodlands. Have to make this work.
Flesh Embryo
Flesh Embryo

The Embryo of the Flesh. When leaving, the Cocoon immediately reaches adult size by mutated cells of the body, capable to performing billions of divisions a second. Dangerous!. Activated by impact (throw on the ground). Time after the activation before the appearance of an adult organism: within ten to fifteen seconds. Edible, satisfies hunger, a little healing and accelerates wound healing. The recommended distance to the center of activation - not less than ten meters.
Mutated Rat Embryo
Mutated Rat Embryo

Tushkano Cocoon. Contains up to five embryos. Growth to the state of adult Tushkana - instant. Activated by impact (throw on the ground). Time after the activation before the appearance of an adult organism within ten to fifteen seconds. Edible, satisfies hunger, a little healing and accelerates wound healing. The recommended distance to the center of activation - no less than seven meters.
Pseudogiant Embryo
Pseudogiant Embryo

Pseudogiant Embryo. Extremely rare. Maturation of the cocoon before activating up to several months. Growth after activation by the accumulated potential is divided by the body's cells, instantly. Is simply an increase in cell size rather than their quantity. Activated by impact (throw on the ground). Time after the activation before the appearance of an adult organism: within ten to fifteen seconds. Edible, satisfies hunger, a little bit healing and accelerates wound healing. The recommended distance to the center of the activation of at least fifteen feet.
Poltergeist Embryo
Poltergeist Embryo

Poltergeist Embryo. Extremely rare. Necessary for the maturation of the cocoon darkness. Sunlight duration of maturation multiplied. Growth after activation - instant. Activated by impact (throw on the ground). Time after the activation before the appearance of an adult organism: within ten to fifteen seconds. Edible, satisfies hunger, a little bit healing and accelerates wound healing. The recommended distance to the center of the activation of at least twelve feet.
Controller Embryo
Controller Embryo

The Embryo of the Controller. Insanely rare, since such a method of 'breeding' is not typical for this type of mutants. Able to reproduce only Mother Controllers. In vivo activation produces a parent myself with the help of telepathy. Growth mechanism when activated - is unknown. Growth after activation - instant. Activated by impact (throw on the ground). Time after the activation before the appearance of an adult organism: within ten to fifteen seconds. The recommended distance to the center of the activation of at least twenty-five meters.
Chimera Embryo
Chimera Embryo

Chimera Embryo. Is unknown, but it seems that the cocoon is already mature individual who has become dormant. Growth after activation - instant. After activation - extremely aggressive and dangerous. Activated by impact (throw on the ground). Time after the activation before the appearance of an adult organism: within ten to fifteen seconds. Edible, fully satisfies hunger, instantly restores health and heals wounds. The recommended distance to the center of the activation of at least twenty-five meters.
Feral Cat Embryo
Feral Cat Embryo

Embryo of a Feral Cat. Remains a mystery of his immediate increase after activation. Argued that the reason for the rapid maturation of a food parents. And that, basically, Radioactive rats. Usually occurs the birth of two individuals. Growth after activation - instant. Activated by impact (throw on the ground). Time after the activation before the appearance of an adult organism: within ten to fifteen seconds. Edible, satisfies hunger, a little healing and accelerates wound healing. The recommended distance to the center of the activation of at least ten meters.
Boar Embryo
Boar Embryo

The embryo of a Wild Boar. Infrequent, since it is not the main way of breeding boars. Instantaneous growth following activation is achieved by a sharp increase in air 'layers' in muscle tissue, which, as animal food, replaced the normal fat and muscle tissue. Growth after activation - instant. Activated by impact (throw on the ground). Time after the activation before the appearance of an adult organism within ten to fifteen seconds. Edible, satisfies hunger, a little healing and accelerates wound healing. The recommended distance to the center of the activation of at least fifteen feet.

Time after the activation before the appearance of an adult organism: within ten to fifteen seconds. Edible, satisfies hunger, a little healing and accelerates wound healing. The recommended distance to the center of the activation of at least twelve feet.

Toxic, reduces the health and speed healing of wounds, though, and relieves hunger. The recommended distance to the center of the activation of at least fifteen feet.

The mechanism of instantaneous growth, probably due to a combination of options for the growth of Embryos for Chimeras and Pseudogiants. Extremely dangerous!. Activated by impact (throw on the ground). Time after the activation before the appearance of an adult organism: within ten to fifteen seconds. Edible, satisfies hunger, little treats and accelerates the healing of wounds, lightly displays radiation. The recommended distance to the center of the activation of at least twenty-five meters.

The Generator
The Generator

The generator of electromagnetic interference. Used to block electrical and radio signals. Some specimens are provided with a display for the installation of power generator and set at a certain rate.

In order to get access to the basement with the scientist who ran away from the C-consciousness base, we need to locate and eliminate a chopper which is flying around the northern area of the Generators. This chopper is flying high and scanning the area for the lost scientist.\nWhen you locate the helicopter, fire at the chopper with a high calibre weapon to attract it's attention, then when it flies in closer to take a better look, shoot it down. When the chopper is damaged, report back to the Countryman to get access to the basement.

Find Ghost, the former Trader of the village in the Generators vicinity. He is bound to a way into the c-consciousness base, and can scout if Panther is being held there.\nHe was last time seen wandering very drunk through the northeren area's of the Swamps. It's most likely he has taken shelter somewhere.

One of the Black Doctor's men will fly a helicopter to the cemetary in the Swamps, to pick up you and Ghost. Travel towards the Cemetary, and make sure Ghost survives. When you get close to the cemetary, the helicopter will make contact with you and give you you're next orders.

In order to turn off the Psi-Antenna's surrounding the c-consciousness base, Anderson needs his Joystick back which he programmed to edit the software inside the Psi-Antenna's. The only problem is, he didn't know where he lost his Joystick. The only thing he knows is he lost it somewhere during a routine check in the Generators vicinity. He also sent us a picture with the route he walked that day. Locate the Joystick and bring it back to Anderson for further instructions.\nHint: The joystick gives off a red light as long as the batteries are still intact, so searching for this small device would be alot easier at night, except maybe for the Mutants roaming around under the cover of darkness.

Guide Ghost towards the edge of the Psi-Field and wait for him to deactivate all the Antenna's. For the Psi-Field to lower to safe point of Psi-Emission we need to wait a bit.\nWait for Ghost to get back to the edge of the Psi-Field, in order to not cause suspicion he will walk towards another point more west of your location.\nTalk to him there to find out if he has seen Panther, or any other suspicous activity in the base, and report back to Ghost. Wait for the Psi-Emission to lower to a safe level.

Capture the base by force, and be very quick. The faster the base is under control, the more chance we have that Panther is still alive.\nFritz and the Black Doctor's men will attack through the western side, where there's a hole in the wall. Together with Ghost we will attack through the main gate.
Meet with one of the Black Doctor's messengers, up north near the transistion to the Hospital.\nHe should have a Dossier with all the info that the Black Doctor knows about the Astrologer.

Find the secret cave in the Reconnoitered Earth, but do not go into the cave, we don't know what to expect down there.\nThe teleport deactivator we found in the c-consciousness base, indicates that a teleport is blocking the entry, it will deactivate later.\nAs soon as you have found the cave, report to Fang who is residing in the Fiery Cave.
Klemenov has some news regarding the experiments with the Heart of the Poltergeist artefact, go towards Warlab and see what has become of this Experiment.

Fly wants you to retrieve a doll that she supposedly lost while on a trip through the Zone when she was younger, she lost the doll somewhere in the Area of the Brain Scorcher, she said that it's most likely in one of the houses she took shelter in.\nRetrieve this "precious" doll, and bring it to her. After this she will hopefully tell us what happened to the artefact she claims to have seen.

Turns out the Helicopter with the backpack, with the Water Flower artefact in it, was shot down over the CNPP, together with two other Helicopters, during a raid.\nVoronin asked us to check up with one of these Helicopters who should still have an intact Flight Data Recorder. It is located on top of the Sarcophagus.\nWhen you find this Flight Data Recorder, report back to Voronin and see if he can learn something from the information that should be in it.

That had to work on the 'C-consciousness' ... True, the Panthers said it was a myth. But can you believe her? We must return to the generators, to find there, and Andersen Solvador. They will tell you what to do next. As a result, all my bodily movements must earn the third generator. Otherwise, the Fly can not be resurrected. And if this is possible at all? However, we must try. I'm indirectly responsible for her death.

The Black Doctor needs a Third Generator to make enough energy to conduct more research.\nTherefore you need to disable five Psi-Field jammers located in the Sub-station next to the C-consciousness base.\nFind these jammers and bring them to Anderson. After you have done this; talk to Anderson and wait for the third generator to go online.

Fang will stay behind, while you go the the specified location given to you Fang.\nFang has information that the Astrologer will get to the CNPP North through the gate near this location, so keep an eye on the gate.\nIf the Astrologer appears, call Fang and fight of the Astrologers troops.
Fang has found the Astrologer at some other place, and has sent you to an ambush location.\nGet back to Fang as fast as possible, and help him fight off the Astrologer's troops.
To find accommodation and help Lightning, there is useful information. It is located in a sort of control center, where many corridors.

Find a house in Limansk. According to Lightning, on its roof is a teleporter, which is likely, and took advantage of her friend. We must find this man. He has a Detector Isomorphic and learn about the location of the second portal in Zamonolite.

Transmutator
Transmutator

Device consists of three lines of slots, and two control buttons (office - scroll and reset - do not count). In the middle range (Inv) - content inventory, the figure on top of an element means number of elements in this form (on the sides - buttons to scroll left and right). Clicking on an item in this range puts it into the top line (COMP) as a potential ingredient for cooking. Clicking on an element in Comp returns it back to Inv. The right of the comp down arrow button is used to reset the entire contents could line COMP ago Inv. In the same line of Complementary displayed in different cells.
 under the top line of a row of lemon-colored to display the name of the anomaly. If anomalies are not close (distance by less than 2m) - there is nothing displayed. If there is an anomaly, but the recipe for it to be developed - also have iformatsionnaya line.
 At the bottom line (Retz) appear prescriptions under the current anomaly in the future as a result of cooking (there are also buttons to scroll left and right). Clicking on an item in Retz is automatically filled Comp in the presence of components in inventory. If some components of the recipe is not enough - below the comp a red bar appears with the information.
 Start button starts the cooking of the selected components. If anomalies are not around - does not work.
 If the inventory is lit by a red line (ie, a recipe is, but lacks the components) - perhaps an unexpected reaction to the owner. If there is no recipe - red line in any case, nothing will - try to cook at your own risk (if not match the existing in-game recipes - the result can be placheven if guessing the recipe - start cooking, the owner transmutatora will be given a prescription). When the coincidence of the recipe ingredients and anomalies, and click Run - will start brewing process, the artefacts of the line comp automatically removed from inventory and launch signaled by flashing the screen.
 Exit button closes the user interface. The interface also closes automatically when the failure starts cooking.

I have the honor to inform you the following items. Time to study the subject was not enough, so we found out only the basic parameters. If the object is a living creature, he applied considerable damage and sometimes death. Part of the reflected energy is imprinted on the matrix of the camera and converted into a picture. Probably on the images to appear something more than what the normal eye can see. The energy emitted in the production of the image is contained in an airtight container, built in the body. I experimented. Make a simple camera shots of objects is not possible. Probably, the momentum can be sent only to objects that have some additional qualities or characteristics. What are these objects and how to find them - an enigma. However, judging by the pictures made you successful, it is not quite ordinary objects or living beings.\nMaples ..
